attributes.action: Increase Incapacity benefit to a livable level for those genuinely claiming whilst off work due to disability/ill health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make IB at a rate whereby those who claim it genuinely can live to a reasonable level, without worrying about perscription charges, and other related health care costs, also automatic entitlement to full help with rent/council tax, As well as the right to apply for 'Budgeting loans' 'Crisis loans' and other financial help those who are claiming Income support already get.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
